segment.source: Planning to Deploy App-V
segment.target: Planning to Deploy App-V

segment.source: You should consider a number of different deployment configurations and prerequisites before you create your deployment plan for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1.
segment.target: You should consider a number of different deployment configurations and prerequisites before you create your deployment plan for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1.

segment.source: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.
segment.target: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.

segment.source: App-V 5.1 supported configurations
segment.target: App-V 5.1 supported configurations

segment.source: Describes the minimum hardware and operating system requirements for each App-V components.
segment.target: Describes the minimum hardware and operating system requirements for each App-V components.

segment.source: For information about software prerequisites that you must install before you install App-V, see App-V 5.1 Prerequisites.
segment.target: For information about software prerequisites that you must install before you install App-V, see App-V 5.1 Prerequisites.

segment.source: App-V 5.1 Supported Configurations
segment.target: App-V 5.1 Supported Configurations

segment.source: App-V 5.1 capacity planning
segment.target: App-V 5.1 capacity planning

segment.source: Describes the available options for scaling your App-V 5.1 deployment.
segment.target: Describes the available options for scaling your App-V 5.1 deployment.

segment.source: App-V 5.1 Capacity Planning
segment.target: App-V 5.1 Capacity Planning

segment.source: Planning for high availability with App-V 5.1
segment.target: Planning for high availability with App-V 5.1

segment.source: Describes the available options for ensuring high availability of App-V 5.1 databases and services.
segment.target: Describes the available options for ensuring high availability of App-V 5.1 databases and services.

segment.source: Planning for High Availability with App-V 5.1
segment.target: Planning for High Availability with App-V 5.1

segment.target: Planning to Deploy App-V 5.1 with an Electronic Software Distribution System

segment.target: Describes the options and requirements for deploying App-V with an electronic software distribution system.

segment.source: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Server deployment
segment.target: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Server deployment

segment.source: Describes the planning considerations for the App-V Server components and their functions.
segment.target: Describes the planning considerations for the App-V Server components and their functions.

segment.source: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Sequencer and Client deployment
segment.target: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Sequencer and Client deployment

segment.source: Describes the planning considerations for the App-V Client and for the Sequencer software, which you use to create virtual applications and application packages.
segment.target: Describes the planning considerations for the App-V Client and for the Sequencer software, which you use to create virtual applications and application packages.

segment.source: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Sequencer and Client Deployment
segment.target: Planning for the App-V 5.1 Sequencer and Client Deployment

segment.source: Planning for migrating from a previous version of App-V
segment.target: Planning for migrating from a previous version of App-V

segment.source: Describes the recommended path for migrating from previous versions of App-V, while ensuring that existing server configurations, packages and clients continue to work in your new App-V environment.
segment.target: Describes the recommended path for migrating from previous versions of App-V, while ensuring that existing server configurations, packages and clients continue to work in your new App-V environment.

segment.source: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V
segment.target: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V

segment.source: Planning for using App-V with Office
segment.target: Planning for using App-V with Office
